name: Mutate & Detonate
description:
Swing around on a rope and fling bombs at the mutant. The bombs inherit your momentum, so make sure you're moving fast. As you fight, the boss will mutate and gain random upgrades.

Controls:

A/D - Move

W - Jump

S - Fast Fall

Left Click - Grapple/Ungrapple

Right Click - Throw Bomb

Esc - Exit

R - Restart

Credits:

3D Model of Ivy made by Anthony DeFilippo: https://antpant.wixsite.com/adfolio

Amphibia belongs to Disney
